content: Nail-embedded wood reciprocating saw blades Heavy-duty reciprocating saw blade designed for demolishing wood containing nails – strong in metal, fast in wood ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Saw blades- - - ### FEATURES:Features Durable bimetal blades engineered to last longer and cut faster through metal-embedded wood Three lengths available – choosing the right length based on the shape of your workpiece can increase comfort and efficiency Applications Faster cuts for demolition Cutting wood beams Cutting strut Demolishing metal-embedded wood ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Premium Shank: 1/2 in universal shank Teeth per inch: 6 Technical Data | Product Class | Premium | Shank | 1/2 in universal shank | Teeth per inch | 6 | Blade features | Heavy duty, Fast cut, Long life ### ITEMS- 2222128 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 6 (5) w/m - Package Size 5 pc - 2222125 - Recip. saw blade SP 6 6 (35) w/m - Package Size 35 pc - 2222126 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 6 (5) w/m - Package Size 5 pc - 2222129 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 6 (35) w/m - Package Size 35 pc - 2222130 - Recip. saw blade SP 9 6 (175) w/m - Package Size 175 pc - 2222131 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 6 (5) w/m - Package Size 5 pc - 2222132 - Recip. saw blade SP 12 6 (35) w/m - Package Size 35 pc - 3938299 - Recip Bld 23 6 (35) w/m 2 for 1 - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 70x Recip. saw blade SP 9 6 (35) w/m
